Rulings.Edison:
●If this card is destroyed while face-down, it still does damage to your opponent.
●If this card’s activation is negated, such as with Magic Jammer or Riryoku Field it does not do damage to your opponent.
●Black Pendant activates in the GY, so if it is destroyed when Imperial Order is on the field, it still does damage to your opponent.
●You can chain to the activation of the effect of Black Pendant when it is sent to the GY.
Rulings.Tengu:
●If this card is destroyed while face-down, it still does damage to your opponent.
●If this card’s activation is negated, such as with Magic Jammer or Riryoku Field it does not do damage to your opponent.
●Black Pendant activates in the GY, so if it is destroyed when Imperial Order is on the field, it still does damage to your opponent.

Rulings.Goat:
●If this card is destroyed while face-down, it still does damage to your opponent.
●If this card’s activation is negated, such as with Magic Jammer or Riryoku Field it does not do damage to your opponent.
●Black Pendant activates in the GY, so if it is destroyed when Imperial Order is on the field, it still does damage to your opponent.
●You can chain to the activation of the effect of Black Pendant when it is sent to the GY.
●Q: Does “Black Pendant” have to be equipped in order for its effect (when sent from the field to the GY) to be used? 
A: “Black Pendant's” effect is based on being sent to the GY from the field, not being equipped to a monster. 
●Q: If I attack with a monster, can my opponent activate “Black Pendant” and equip it to one of their monsters? 
A: No. Black Pendant cannot be used in the Battle Phase.

Rulings.Base:
1. If this card is destroyed while face-down, it still does damage to your opponent.
2. If this card's activation is negated, such as with "Magic Jammer" or "Riryoku Field" it does not do damage to your opponent.
3. "Black Pendant" activates in the GY, so if it is destroyed when "Imperial Order" is on the field, it still does damage to your opponent.
4. You can chain to the activation of the effect of "Black Pendant" when it is sent to the GY.
